Package com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.typesystem

Class AbstractDeclaredType

java.lang.Object
com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.typesystem.AbstractType
com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.typesystem.AbstractDeclaredType
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAnnotatable, IDeclaredType, IElementType, IExpressionType, IReferenceType, IReturnType, IType, IVariableType
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomDeclaredType, ReflectiveDeclaredType
public abstract class AbstractDeclaredType extends AbstractType implements IDeclaredType
This class provides a partial implementation of the IDeclaredType interface.
Author:
Mackenzie High

      Parameters:
      factory - type-factory that is used to access types.
      descriptor - is the type-descriptor of the new type.

  • Method Details

    • getNamespace

      public String getNamespace()
      This method returns the name of the package that this type is declared within.

      Examples

      getName() getNamespace()
      java.lang.String java.lang
      java.util.List java.util

      Specified by:
      getNamespace in interface IDeclaredType
      Returns:
      the name of the package that this type is declared within.

    • getAllSuperclasses

      public List<IClassType> getAllSuperclasses()
      This method returns all the superclasses of this type.

      The returned list is ordered from most-specific to most general.

      Specified by:
      getAllSuperclasses in interface IDeclaredType
      Returns:
      an immutable list containing all the superclasses of this type, or an empty immutable list, if no superclasses are present.

    • getAllSuperinterfaces

      public Collection<IInterfaceType> getAllSuperinterfaces()
      This method returns all the superinterfaces of this type.
      Specified by:
      getAllSuperinterfaces in interface IDeclaredType
      Returns:
      an immutable collection containing all the superinterfaces of this type, or an empty immutable collection, if no superinterfaces are present.

    • getAllVisibleMethods

      public Collection<IMethod> getAllVisibleMethods()
      This method returns all the explicit and implicit methods that this type declares.

      Inherited method are included in the returned list. Private methods are never inherited. Static methods are never inherited.

      Specified by:
      getAllVisibleMethods in interface IDeclaredType
      Returns:
      an immutable collection containing all the methods that are declared in this type.

    • isSubtypeOf

      public boolean isSubtypeOf(IType target)
      This method determines whether this type is a subtype of another type.
      Specified by:
      isSubtypeOf in interface IType
      Parameters:
      target - is the other type itself.
      Returns:
      true, if and only if, this type is a subtype of the target type.

    • isNullType

      public boolean isNullType()
      This method determines whether this type is the null-type.

      Remember, the null-type is also a reference-type.

      Specified by:
      isNullType in interface IExpressionType
      Specified by:
      isNullType in interface IReferenceType
      Returns:
      true, iff this type is the null-type.
